scripts.start: npm run build-front-end && npm run start-server
scripts.build-front-end: cd front-end && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start-server: npm run install-server && npm run run-server
scripts.run-local-react: cd front-end && REACT_APP_LOCAL_SERVER=yes PORT=4000 npm start
scripts.run-local-react:windows: cd front-end && SET REACT_APP_LOCAL_SERVER=yes& SET PORT=4000& npm start
